snippet.title: Drift: Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Build, explore and survive the harshness of space with friends in the mysterious asteroid field that destroyed your ship. Beautiful music by Curtis Schweitzer (Starbound, Halo: Infinite) will accompany you in this new open-world space adventure.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2159650/Drift/
